Trigger.name: Kuro
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Dropping into a lower stance, (you) sweep .+ at the \w+ thigh of (.+)\.$
^Falling back into a low crouch, (you) lash out with a swift strike at the \w+ thigh of (.+)\.$
^Dropping back into a low crouch, (\w+) whips .+ in a swift strike at the \w+ thigh of (.+)\.$
^Dropping into a lower stance, (\w+) sweeps .+ at the \w+thigh of (.+)\.$
